name: tgptps

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c0, ctmd))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ TopGrp, c0 ∈ TopSp, c0 ∈ TopMnd)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, ctps))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c0, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c0 ∈ TopSp)

comment: A topological group is a topological space. (Contributed by FL, 21-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
